snippet.title: Deck of Souls — Early Access Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Get Deck of Souls Now - https://store.steampowered.com/app/2088770/Deck_of_Souls/

Deck of Souls is a rough deck-building roguelike inspired by the Souls series. The game is available on Steam!
